description: Bad Piggies is a mobile and PC game in which players build contraptions and attempt to pilot them through increasingly difficult levels. The game saves the contraptions that players build as CONTRAPTION files.

Players can create and modify contraptions in Bad Piggies. Typically, players do not manually open or edit Bad Piggies CONTRAPTION files. However, modders who are interested in viewing a CONTRAPTION file's structure can decrypt the file using Bad_Piggies_Save_v1.1.bms and QuickBMS.
